EmailTemplate.name: 2020 Dealer Update #2.2020 Dealer Update #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - March 6, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | March 2020 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2020-04 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-04 Rev A_Hawker 800 %26 1000 Special Offering FMS 6.1 %26 ADSB.pdf]]> Hawker 800 & 1000 Special Offering FMS 6.1 & ADS-B - 2020-09 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-09%20Rev A Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-09%20Rev A Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement - 2020-10 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-10%20Rev A_FMS 6.1 Upgrade for Business Aircraft Equipped with NZ-2000.pdf]]>Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-10%20Rev A_FMS 6.1 Upgrade for Business Aircraft Equipped with NZ-2000.pdf]]> CD-830 Control Display Unit for Business Aircraft - 2020-14 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-14 Rev A SmartRunway SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> SmartRunway/SmartLanding and the Original RAAS for Business Aircraft - 2020-24 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-24_Rev A_Satcom High Data Rate for Business Aircraft_Draft.pdf]]> FMS 6.1 Upgrade for Business Aircraft Equipped with NZ-2000 - 2020-38 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-38 Rev A HD-710 and HSD-400 Satcom Conversions.pdf]]> Satcom High Data Rate for Business Aircraft - 2020-41 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-41 Inmarsat Swift64 End Of Service Options.pdf]]> Inmarsat Swift64 End Of Service Options
- 2020-42 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-42 GoDirect Cabin Router for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> GoDirect Cabin Router for Business Aircraft - 2020-43 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-43 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]> Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters - 2020-44 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-44 JetWave Intro Promotion for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> JetWave Intro Promotion for Business Aircraft
Dealers can find 2020 sales bulletins on our website under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
